message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand that $10000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm now offering the product to you for $12500.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. Let's try to reach an agreement.
I'm still not getting the price I want, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $13000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
